data.text: @greg_travis @GovAbbott children death rates increased! How many deaths are on your shoulders for taking school mandates for masks away.

@greg_travis Thank you Gregory for your advocacy. Some of our most active members are parents trying to keep children safe.

The service behind this account allows you to find other “COVID careful” families and individuals in your local area and organize safer activities.
@kadelopa @greg_travis @charles_gaba /smh   Thinking the world is your servant and fussing when you don't get the help you inarticulately asked for...

@greg_travis @charles_gaba I asked for specific info. Names places. Links would have been great. Instead, you assumed the worst. You could have asked for clarification. I’ll keep looking for the secret stats that are not to be found this far.
@greg_travis @charles_gaba I can give a damn about specifics because I can do something about my area besides just feeling hopeless. Thank you for nothing.

@greg_travis @charles_gaba You misunderstand. No need to be snide. I live in Utah where our “leaders” pretend that covid is nothing. They tell of deaths sporadically and often very, very delayed. No specific names are named. I was asking for specific info. You gave me attitude. Screw that.

@greg_travis @charles_gaba nobody wants to get in a car accident either, but imagine not wearing a seat belt, taking out airbags and then going driving in a neighborhood full of bars on a Friday night. want is irrelevant, probability of it happening is.

@kadelopa @charles_gaba So as long as US females continue producing ten thousand new children every day, losing five kids a day to COVID is fine

Right?

@sirgetagrip @charles_gaba Nobody wants COVID.

It is a deadly vascular pathogen that causes brain damage, pulmonary aging and damage to the immune system in even mild infections
